 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂחַק‎</span> **verb** ==laugh== (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צהק‎</span>, q. v.; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂחַק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחַק‎</span>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal*****Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׂ‎</span> consecutive [[Prov.29.9|Prov 29:9]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׂחֲקוּ‎</span> [[Lam.1.7|Lam 1:7]]; [[Job.30.1|Job 30:1]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂחַק‎</span> [[Job.39.7|Job 39:7]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂחוֺק‎</span> [[Judg.16.24|Judg 16:24]]; [[Eccl.3.4|Eccl 3:4]] — 

**l. a.** ***laugh*** at, usually in contempt, derision, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Job.30.1|Job 30:1]]; [[Ps.52.8|Ps 52:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing [[Lam.1.7|Lam 1:7]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person God subject [[Ps.37.13|Ps 37:13]]; [[Ps.59.9|Ps 59:9]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעַג‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing or person= have no fear of, [[Hab.1.10|Hab 1:10]]; [[Job.5.22|Job 5:22]]; [[Prov.31.25|Prov 31:25]] also, figurative, of noble animals [[Job.39.7|Job 39:7]]; [[Job.39.18|Job 39:18]]; [[Job.39.22|Job 39:22]]; [[Job.41.21|Job 41:21]] absolute, [[Prov.29.9|Prov 29:9]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַז‎</span>), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.2.4|Ps 2:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעֵג‎</span>), of wisdom [[Prov.1.26|Prov 1:26]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> temporal; \|\| ***id.***).


$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person, apparently of friendly laugh [[Job.29.24|Job 29:24]] in general [[Eccl.3.4|Eccl 3:4]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּכָה‎</span>). 

**2.** ***sport, play***, [[Judg.16.27|Judg 16:27]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשִׂחַקְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[1Sam.6.21|1Sam 6:21]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְשַׂחֶקֿ‎</span> [[Judg.16.25|Judg 16:25]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשֵׂחֶקֿ‎</span> [[Ps.104.26|Ps 104:26]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂחֵק‎</span> [[Prov.26.19|Prov 26:19]]; [[1Chr.15.29|1Chr 15:29]], feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֵׂחֶ֫קֶת‎</span> [[Prov.8.30|Prov 8:30]]; [[Prov.8.31|Prov 8:31]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂחֲקִים‎</span> [[2Sam.6.5|2Sam 6:5]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂחֲקוֺת‎</span> [[1Sam.18.7|1Sam 18:7]] — 

**1.** ***make sport***, [[Judg.16.25|Judg 16:25]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person) [[2Sam.2.14|2Sam 2:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> person; in tournament), [[Prov.8.30|Prov 8:30]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span>), v[[Prov.8.31|Prov 8:31]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> loc). 

**2.** ***jest***, [[Prov.26.19|Prov 26:19]]. 

**3.** ***play:*** including instrumental music, singing and dancing [[1Sam.18.7|1Sam 18:7]], c <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span>. [[2Sam.6.5|2Sam 6:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> instrumental), = [[1Chr.13.8|1Chr 13:8]]; [[2Sam.6.21|2Sam 6:21]]; [[1Chr.15.29|1Chr 15:29]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַקֵּד‎</span>); of merry-making [[Jer.15.17|Jer 15:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַז‎</span>), [[Jer.30.19|Jer 30:19]]; [[Jer.31.4|Jer 31:4]] of children's sport [[Zech.8.5|Zech 8:5]] of beasts [[Job.40.20|Job 40:20]]; [[Ps.104.25|Ps 104:25]] of man, ***play*** with (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) crocod, [[Job.40.29|Job 40:29]]. **Hiph\`il** (declar.) ***Participle.*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂחִיקִים‎</span> [[2Chr.30.10|2Chr 30:10]] they ***uttered mockery*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵיהֶם‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְעִנִים‎</span>).
